name: m365-information-format-pppp-prompt
title: Using the 4Ps framework to organise information with Microsoft Copilot.
shortDescription: This prompt will ask Copilot to transform data into a structure that aligns with the user's preferred information framework.
longDescription: This prompt will ask Copilot to convert text to data into a structure that aligns with the user's preferred information framework.
